TEI.2.document_title: J. H. Polley to Stephen F Austin, 04-05-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin in account of J. H. Polley, April 5, 1828. Price of labor.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 29

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin in account of J. H. Polley, April 5, 1828. Price of labor.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-17-1827">17th Novr 1827*/date_mentioned* *person_mentioned*James B Austin*/person_mentioned* To *person_mentioned*J H Polley*/person_mentioned* Dr To team work nine days and half_____ 9.50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="04-05-1828">Aprile 5th 1828 */date_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned* To *person_mentioned*J. H. Polly */person_mentioned* Dr to hawling Corn from *location_mentioned*river*/location_mentioned*_________ 3. 00*/p*
*/div1*
